name: Henrique Gomes
summary: Senior AI, Front End Engineer who thrives in building startups from the ground up, no matter the industry. I’ve led the development of sleek, high-performing web apps that scale, working remotely with global teams to deliver exceptional user experiences. Passionate about turning ideas into polished, responsive interfaces that drive growth.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.summary: I have worked on several projects in various roles, including frontend, backend, DevOps, or a combination of these. I have also contributed to improving development processes and technology across the company.
highlights: Led development of a high-performance web application, achieving a 97% PageSpeed score through Next.js optimization, SEO improvements, and AWS infrastructure setup (Route53, CloudFront, EC2, ELB, RDS).
Architected and deployed a microservices backend using NestJS, Golang and MongoDB, implementing API documentation with Swagger and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and established development standards that reduced bug reports by 40%.
Built CMS and admin portals using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and ShadCN, optimizing for mobile experiences and enhancing user engagement.
Developed cloud-native microservices using Python (FastAPI, AsyncIO) and Node.js, deployed on Kubernetes with Istio, improving system scalability, reliability, and observability.
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, reducing API response times by 60%.
Designed and implemented a secure authentication system using JWT and OAuth2, ensuring GDPR compliance.
Used Jest and react-test-renderer for unit and integration testing, and Cypress for end-to end (E2E) testing.
Led the development of React Native applications for mobile platforms, integrating core business services and APIs, ensuring seamless mobile performance alongside the web app.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Built and maintained an AI-driven platform that supports business decision-making. Worked mainly on the frontend side with Angular, NgRx and rxjs. Built a microservice using NestJS on the backend side with RabbitMQ for messaging. Mentored junior guys to let them grow in a collaborative team environment.
highlights: Improved team productivity by 30% by developing a real-time AI-powered task prioritization system with Angular and RxJS.
Handled 50K concurrent users by implementing WebSocket integration for live updates and notifications.
Reduced development time by 40% by creating a reusable UI components library with NgRx state management.
Set up an automated testing pipeline with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% test coverage.
Developed and maintained GraphQL APIs with Node.js (NestJS) and Python (Django REST Framework), improving personalized content delivery and increasing customer engagement by 30%.
Utilized advanced caching strategies (Redis, CDNs) and PostgreSQL sharding to improve data access speed and reduce operational costs.
Integrated mobile-first design principles into the platform’s UI/UX to ensure a seamless experience across devices.
Automated infrastructure management with Terraform and Jenkins, streamlining CI/CD pipelines and improving release cycles.
Conducted code reviews for mid and junior level developers while promoting test-driven development and clean architecture principles.

experience.title: Full Stack developer
experience.summary: Contributed to building a Ticket Management System similar to ClickUp, built reusable components and integrated storybook for component testing. Collaborated with designers and product managers to ensure the interface was user-friendly and aligned with the business goals.
highlights: Developed scalable RESTful APIs and data integration solutions using PHP (Laravel) and Python (Django), automating supply chain workflows and reducing operational overhead by 25%.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and established development standards that reduced bug reports by 40%.
Created interactive dashboards and visualization tools using Vue.js and D3.js, enabling real-time monitoring and decision-making for large-scale supply chain operations.
Managed database design, optimization, and migration efforts for large MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.
Led the adoption of Docker, improving development workflows and ensuring consistent environments across local and staging setups.
Contributed to a significant reduction in production defects by implementing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Built and maintained a health insurance platform from the ground up. Used Laravel, Blade, jQuery, Bootstrap, MongoDB, RESTful API, Nginx, AWS.
highlights: Developed and maintained 5 scalable web applications using React, Angular, Vue, Laravel, MongoDB, and Express.js, improving platform stability improving platform stability.
Designed APIs and managed front-end development.
Architected databases and deployed applications using modern DevOps practices.
Optimized performance and implemented responsive UI/UX.
Integrated third-party services such as Stripe, Firebase, and RESTful APIs.
Contributed to several Shopify-based projects including theme customization and layout changes using Liquid.
Performed lightweight integrations with apps.

education.description: Major concentration in Software Development, Algorithm Design, and Database Management Systems with distinction.
